Structs/KindleKit/Note.html#/s:9KindleKi.name: annotationType
Structs/KindleKit/Note.html#/s:9KindleKi.abstract: The type of annotation that the user has made (example yellow highlight)

Structs/KindleKit/Note.html#/s:9KindleKi.name: location
Structs/KindleKit/Note.html#/s:9KindleKi.abstract: The page on which this note is in the book.

Structs/KindleKit/NotesContainer.html#/s.name: bookName
Structs/KindleKit/NotesContainer.html#/s.abstract: The name of the book as seen on the second line from the CSV file.

Structs/KindleKit/NotesContainer.html#/s.name: bookAuthor
Structs/KindleKit/NotesContainer.html#/s.abstract: The name of the author of the book as seen on the third line from the CSV file.

Structs/KindleKit/NotesContainer.html#/s.name: notes
Structs/KindleKit/NotesContainer.html#/s.abstract: All notes contained inside the ‘CSV’ that this NotesContainer represents.

Structs/KindleKit/Error.html#/s:9KindleK.name: formatInvalid(_:)
Structs/KindleKit/Error.html#/s:9KindleK.abstract: Occurs when parsing fails. It can contain reason why parsing failed.

Structs/KindleKit.html#/s:9KindleKitAAV5.name: parse(kindleCSV:)
Structs/KindleKit.html#/s:9KindleKitAAV5.abstract: Tries to parse Kindle eReader generated ‘CSV’ file into a convenient format.

Structs/KindleKit/Error.html.name: Error
Structs/KindleKit/Error.html.abstract: All Possible errors that can occur during parsing of CSV string from Kidle’s CSV format.

Structs/KindleKit/NotesContainer.html.name: NotesContainer
Structs/KindleKit/NotesContainer.html.abstract: Representation of ‘CSV’ file from a Kindle’s eReader’s CSV export.

Structs/KindleKit/Note.html.name: Note
Structs/KindleKit/Note.html.abstract: Representation of single Note or Hightlight from a Kindle’s eReader’s CSV export.

Structs/KindleKit.html.name: KindleKit
Structs/KindleKit.html.abstract: Library that contains all functionality needed to parse a Kindle eReader generated CSV file.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9KindleKitE0.name: isValidKindleCSV
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9KindleKitE0.abstract: Gives information whether this string conforms to the standard ‘csv’ format produced by Kindle eBook readers. The check is not definitive.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9KindleKitE1.name: kindleBookName
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9KindleKitE1.abstract: Extraction of book name if this string is a valid Kindle eReader generated CSV.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9KindleKitE1.name: kindleBookAuthor
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9KindleKitE1.abstract: Extraction of book author name if this string is a valid Kindle eReader generated CSV.

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9KindleKitE1.name: kindleBookNotes
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9KindleKitE1.abstract: Extraction of book notes if this string is a valid Kindle eReader generated CSV.
